completion_duas.title: Tahmid after Tasbih
completion_duas.arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّٰهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ، وَهو عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
completion_duas.transliteration: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir
completion_duas.translation: There is no god but Allah alone, without partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is over all things competent

completion_duas.title: Dua for Help in Worship
completion_duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
completion_duas.transliteration: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatik
completion_duas.translation: O Allah, help me in remembering You, thanking You, and worshipping You in the best manner

completion_duas.title: Kaffaratul Majlis
completion_duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ
completion_duas.transliteration: Subhanaka Allahumma wa bihamdika, ash-hadu an la ilaha illa Anta, astaghfiruka wa atubu ilayk
completion_duas.translation: Glory be to You, O Allah, and all praise. I bear witness that there is no god but You. I seek Your forgiveness and I turn to You in repentance

completion_duas.title: Allahumma Antas-Salam
completion_duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ السَّلَامُ، تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
completion_duas.transliteration: Allahumma Antas-Salam wa minkas-salam, tabarakta ya Dhal-Jalali wal-Ikram
completion_duas.translation: O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes peace. Blessed are You, O Owner of Majesty and Honor

tasbih_categories.name: The Four Foundations
tasbih_categories.description: The most beloved words to Allah

items.translation: There is no god but Allah

items.arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
items.transliteration: La ilaha illa Anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
items.translation: There is no god but You, Glory be to You! Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers

tasbih_categories.name: Morning & Evening Adhkar
tasbih_categories.description: Daily remembrances for morning and evening

items.name: Sayyidul Istighfar
items.arabic: ٱللَّٰهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَىٰ عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا ٱسْتَطعتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعِّتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ لَكَ بِذَنْبِي فَٱغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
items.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana abduka, wa ana 'ala ahdika wa wa'dika mastata'tu, a'udhu bika min sharri ma sana'tu, abu'u laka bi ni'matika 'alayya, wa abu'u laka bi dhanbi faghfir li fa innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa anta
items.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord. There is no god but You. You created me, and I am Your servant, and I am faithful to my covenant and my promise to You to the best of my ability. I seek refuge with You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge before You Your blessings bestowed upon me, and I confess to You my sins; so forgive me, for none forgives sins but You
items.virtue: Whoever says it in the morning and dies that day is guaranteed Paradise, and whoever says it in the evening and dies that night is guaranteed Paradise

items.name: Bismillahilladhi
items.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّٰهِ ٱلَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَاءُ، وَهو ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
items.transliteration: Bismillahilladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i, wa huwas-sami'ul 'alim
items.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can cause harm in the earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing
items.virtue: Whoever says it three times in the morning and evening, nothing will harm them until they return

items.name: Raditu Billah
items.arabic: رَضِيتُ بِٱللَّٰهِ رَبًّا، وَبِٱلْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّىٰ ٱللَّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيًّا
items.transliteration: Raditu billahi rabban, wa bil-islami dina, wa bi muhammadin sallallahu alayhi wa sallama nabiyyan
items.translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad (peace be upon him) as my Prophet
items.virtue: Whoever says it three times in the morning and evening, Allah will make them pleased on the Day of Judgment

tasbih_categories.name: Istighfar (Seeking Forgiveness)
tasbih_categories.description: Various forms of seeking Allah's forgiveness

items.name: Astaghfirullah
items.virtue: Whoever seeks forgiveness frequently, Allah will provide for them from every hardship and ease

items.name: Astaghfirullah Al-Adheem
items.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah the Magnificent
